info.name: TweetDeck Header Enhancement
info.description: Removes the border around someone's avatar and resizes the overlay so that the shadow does not interfere with the avatar. Excellent for when you're using a layout for your header and want things to blend in.
info.additionalInfo:
Release:
Probably won't release another version, as this pretty much works. Maybe when it's broken. It's two lines anyway. You'll figure it out.
